DOC.brief_summary: The present study was designed to compare the use of mitomycin in PRK for the treatment of refractive errors and to compare these results to customized Lasik
DOC.brief_title: Customized PRK With Mitomycin Versus Customized Lasik for Myopic Astigmatism
DOC.criteria: Myopia or compound myopic astigmatism, stable refractive error, no associated eye disease Diabetes, autoimmune diseases, topographic abnormalities
